title: Ham and cheese frittata
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk', '60g (2 1/4oz) half-fat crème fraîche', '4 whole eggs', '4 egg whites', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'good pinch of freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 onions, coarsely chopped', '175g (6oz) lean ham, coarsely chopped', '100g (3½/2oz) half-fat mozzarella cheese, grated']
